sentences.sContent: She has had an illustrious career.
sentences.sCn: 她已经有了辉煌的事业。

sentences.sContent: Wagner was just one of many illustrious visitors to the town.
sentences.sCn: 瓦格纳只是到访过这座小镇的众多名人中的一位。

remMethod.val: il(进入) + lus(光) + tr + ious → 进入光中 → 著名的

trans.tranOther: famous and admired because of what you have achieved
